title: Going outside: to play, to imagine, to learn
creator_credit: Rick Cavaggion and Open College of Further Education (S. Aust.)
brief_description: Outlines ways in which teachers can develop children’s awareness of the natural environment. In a bush setting, five to eleven-year-olds role play the Dam Conflict Game, learning how to become involved in an issue and how to communicate their feelings.
